In the beginning: Honor your father
In the beginning God created the heavens: Honor your father and your mother, so that you may live long in the land the LORD your God is giving you.

In the beginning: The Lord has done it this very day
In the beginning God created the heavens: The Lord has done it this very day; let us rejoice today and be glad.

In the beginning: Your word is a lamp for my feet
In the beginning God created the heavens: Your word is a lamp for my feet, a light on my path.

In the beginning: Trust in the L ORD with all your heart
In the beginning God created the heavens: Trust in the LORD with all your heart and lean not on your own understanding; in all your ways submit to him, and he will make your paths straight.

In the beginning: A gentle answer turns away wrath
In the beginning God created the heavens: A gentle answer turns away wrath, but a harsh word stirs up anger.

In the beginning: For to us a child is born, to us a son is given
In the beginning God created the heavens: For to us a child is born, to us a son is given, and the government will be on his shoulders. And he will be called Wonderful Counselor, mighty God, Everlasting Father, Prince of Peace.

In the beginning: The grass withers
In the beginning God created the heavens: The grass withers and the flowers fall, but the word of our God endures forever.

In the beginning: The LORD is Good
In the beginning God created the heavens: The LORD is Good, a refuge in times of trouble. He cares for those who trust in him.

In the beginning: Jesus said to him, Away from me, Satan! For it is written
In the beginning God created the heavens: Jesus said to him, “Away from me, Satan! For it is written: ‘Worship the Lord your God, and serve him only.’”

In the beginning: In the same way, let your light shine
In the beginning God created the heavens: In the same way, let your light shine before others, that they may see your good deeds and glorify your Father in heaven.

In the beginning: Do not judge, and you will not be judged
In the beginning God created the heavens: Do not judge, and you will not be judged. Do not condemn and you will not be condemned. Forgive, and you will be forgiven.

In the beginning: So I say to you: Ask and it will be given to you
In the beginning God created the heavens: So I say to you: Ask and it will be given to you; seek and you will find; knock and the door will be opened to you.

In the beginning: For God so loved the world
In the beginning God created the heavens: For God so loved the world that he gave his one and only Son, that whoever believes in him shall not perish but have eternal life.

In the beginning: My command is this
In the beginning God created the heavens: My command is this: Love each other as I have loved you.

In the beginning: They replied, Believe in the Lord Jesus
In the beginning God created the heavens: They replied, “Believe in the Lord Jesus and you will be saved—you and your household.”

In the beginning: And we know that in all things God works for the good
In the beginning God created the heavens: And we know that in all things God works for the good of those who love him, who have been called according to his purpose.

In the beginning: Therefore, I urge you, brothers and sisters, in view of God’s mercy
In the beginning God created the heavens: Therefore, I urge you, brothers and sisters, in view of God’s mercy, to offer your bodies as a living sacrifice, holy and pleasing to God—this is your true and proper worship.

In the beginning: Now it is required
In the beginning God created the heavens: Now it is required that those who have been given a trust must prove faithful.

In the beginning: Be kind and compassionate to one another
In the beginning God created the heavens: Be kind and compassionate to one another, forgiving each other, just as in Christ God forgave you.

In the beginning: Whatever you do
In the beginning God created the heavens: Whatever you do, work at it with all your heart, as working for the Lord, not for human masters.

In the beginning: For the Spirit God gave us does not make us timid
In the beginning God created the heavens: For the Spirit God gave us does not make us timid, but gives us power, love and self-discipline.

In the beginning: All Scripture is God-breathed
In the beginning God created the heavens: All Scripture is God-breathed and is useful for teaching, rebuking, correcting and training in righteousness.

In the beginning: If we confess our sins
In the beginning God created the heavens: If we confess our sins, he is faithful and just and will forgive us our sins and purify us from all unrighteousness.

In the beginning: You are worthy, our Lord and God
In the beginning God created the heavens: “You are worthy, our Lord and God, to receive glory and honor and power, for you created all things, and by your will they were created and have their being.”
